statements: SELECT * FROM charitable_giving_trends
SELECT year, total_donations, average_donation FROM charitable_giving_trends
SELECT largest_donation, num_donors FROM charitable_giving_trends
SELECT year, total_donations, largest_donation, num_donors FROM charitable_giving_trends WHERE year = 2020
SELECT * FROM charitable_giving_trends WHERE num_donors > 500
SELECT year, total_donations FROM charitable_giving_trends WHERE num_donors > 100 ORDER BY year DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT num_donors, total_donations, average_donation FROM charitable_giving_trends WHERE year BETWEEN 2010 AND 2020 ORDER BY num_donors DESC, total_donations ASC;
SELECT year, largest_donation FROM charitable_giving_trends WHERE total_donations > 1000000 ORDER BY largest_donation DESC;
SELECT year, total_donations, num_donors FROM charitable_giving_trends WHERE average_donation < 5000 ORDER BY total_donations ASC;
SELECT year, largest_donation, average_donation FROM charitable_giving_trends WHERE num_donors < 50 ORDER BY year ASC, largest_donation DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM CharityDonations;
SELECT donation_id, charity_name, donation_amount FROM CharityDonations WHERE donation_amount > 100;
SELECT charity_name, donation_amount, donation_date FROM CharityDonations ORDER BY donation_date DESC;
SELECT donor_name, donor_email FROM Donors WHERE donor_id = 1;
SELECT donor_name, charity_name FROM Donors JOIN CharityDonations ON Donors.donation_id = CharityDonations.donation_id;

SELECT donor_name, charitable_name, donation_amount FROM Donors INNER JOIN CharityDonations ON Donors.donation_id = CharityDonations.donation_id WHERE donation_amount > 1000 ORDER BY donation_amount DESC;
SELECT charity_name, SUM(donation_amount) AS total_donation FROM CharityDonations GROUP BY charity_name HAVING total_donation > 5000 ORDER BY total_donation DESC;
SELECT donor_name, donor_email FROM Donors WHERE donor_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY donor_name ASC;
SELECT charity_name, AVG(donation_amount) AS avg_donation FROM CharityDonations GROUP BY charity_name ORDER BY avg_donation DESC;
SELECT donor_name, donation_date FROM Donors INNER JOIN CharityDonations ON Donors.donation_id = CharityDonations.donation_id WHERE donation_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY donation_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM philanthropy_donors;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM philanthropy_donations WHERE donation_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM philanthropy_organizations WHERE sector = 'Healthcare';
SELECT org_name, founding_date FROM philanthropy_organizations ORDER BY founding_date DESC;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM philanthropy_donations WHERE donor_id = 3;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM philanthropy_donors;
SELECT org_name, sector FROM philanthropy_organizations ORDER BY founding_date DESC;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM philanthropy_donors WHERE donation_amount > 1000 ORDER BY donation_amount DESC;

SELECT donor_name, org_name, donation_amount FROM philanthropy_donors JOIN philanthropy_donations ON philanthropy_donors.donor_id = philanthropy_donations.donor_id JOIN philanthropy_organizations ON philanthropy_donations.org_id = philanthropy_organizations.org_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_donations, AVG(donation_amount) AS avg_donation FROM philanthropy_donations GROUP BY donor_id HAVING COUNT(donation_id) > 1;
SELECT * FROM charitable_organizations;
SELECT organization_name, sector, location FROM charitable_organizations ORDER BY organization_name ASC;
SELECT donation_amount, donation_date FROM donation_records WHERE donation_amount > 100;
SELECT donor_name, donor_email FROM donors WHERE donation_count > 5 ORDER BY donor_name DESC;
SELECT organization_name, report_date FROM charitable_organizations JOIN research_reports ON charitable_organizations.organization_id = research_reports.organization_id;
SELECT * FROM charitable_organizations WHERE sector = 'Healthcare' ORDER BY organization_name DESC;
SELECT donation_amount, donation_date FROM donation_records WHERE donation_amount > 1000 ORDER BY donation_date ASC;
SELECT donor_name, donor_email, donation_count FROM donors WHERE donation_count >= 5 ORDER BY donor_name;
SELECT organization_name, team_size, location FROM charitable_organizations WHERE team_size < 20 ORDER BY location, team_size DESC;

SELECT organization_name, report_date, report_content FROM charitable_organizations JOIN research_reports ON charitable_organizations.organization_id = research_reports.organization_id WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM CharitableOrganizations;
SELECT org_name, founding_year, headquarters_location FROM CharitableOrganizations WHERE focus_area = 'Education';
SELECT org_name, founding_year FROM CharitableOrganizations ORDER BY founding_year DESC;
SELECT * FROM Donors WHERE donation_total > 1000;
SELECT donor_name, donation_total, donation_date FROM Donors WHERE donor_type = 'Individual' ORDER BY donation_total DESC;
SELECT org_name, founding_year, headquarters_location, focus_area FROM CharitableOrganizations;
SELECT donor_name, donation_total, donation_date FROM Donors ORDER BY donation_total DESC;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date, description FROM ResearchProjects WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT org_name, COUNT(donation_id) AS total_donations FROM CharitableOrganizations JOIN Donations ON CharitableOrganizations.org_id = Donations.org_id GROUP BY org_name;
SELECT donor_name, donation_date, donation_amount FROM Donors JOIN Donations ON Donors.donor_id = Donations.donor_id WHERE donation_amount > 1000 ORDER BY donation_amount DESC, donation_date ASC;
